sections.heading: Our Rating
content: Each loan is rated from A (low risk, low return) to F (higher risk, higher return). Loans can be used as an investment starting from a C rating.

Cashare brings people together: borrowers who need money and investors who want to invest. Investors choose themselves which loan projects they want to invest in and can diversify their money across many borrowers. This way, the risk is spread widely. There are no hidden fees, but attractive returns. A careful assessment of borrowers provides additional security.

cards.title: What you should know about us
cards.description: Founded in 2008 as the first Swiss crowdlending platform, Cashare has established itself as a leading provider of innovative financing solutions. With over 60,000 customers and CHF 2.5 billion in verified loan applications, Cashare offers proven and secure financial solutions.

cards.title: Transparent & Efficient Processes
cards.description: Cashare stands for clear, fair, and transparent processes. Whether for borrowers or investors, all steps are structured without hidden fees or surprises.Users can make informed financial decisions thanks to real-time updates and detailed analyses.

cards.title: Flexible financial solutions for everyone
cards.description: Cashare connects borrowers with investors, offering a fair alternative to banks.Borrowers benefit from flexible terms, attractive interest rates, and quick processing, while investors gain access to appealing returns and a diversified investment strategy.

cards.title: Attractive Returns for Investors
cards.description: Investors benefit from attractive returns that optimally complement traditional investment forms in a portfolio, especially as an extension in the fixed-income sector.

cards.title: Security Through Intelligent Risk Management
cards.description: Optimize your portfolio with our customized investment solutions for institutional investors. Benefit from strong risk management and professional handling at every stage.

cards.title: Sustainable Financial Solutions
cards.description: Cashare connects borrowers and investors to form a strong financial community. Through crowdlending, financial independence is promoted, and small businesses that otherwise would not have access to fair financing opportunities are supported.
